headline: The AI Trade Is Alive and Living in Industrials, Small-Caps, and Asia
summary: Nvidia and other chip stocks are still going strong, but don’t forget about those sizzling small-caps, industrials, and foreign markets.

headline: Assessing GE Vernova (GEV) Valuation After Dividend Hike Upgrades And AI Power Demand Tailwinds
summary: GE Vernova (GEV) put shareholder returns in focus after its Board declared a $0.50 per share quarterly dividend, payable on April 14, 2026, to investors of record as of March 17. See our latest analysis for GE Vernova. The dividend announcement comes as the stock trades at US$876.01, after a 31.54% 30-day share price return and a very large 1-year total shareholder return of 161.92%. This reflects strong momentum as order growth, backlog expansion and recent upgrades keep attention on GE...

headline: Jim Cramer on GE Vernova: “I Still Like It”
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the stocks that was on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. During the episode, a caller asked if the stock still has more room to run at the current level or not. Cramer replied: Well, GE Vernova is presuming with that price-to-earnings multiple that will continue to build power plants, […]

headline: The White House Portfolio Is Now Worth $9.7 Trillion — And It's Telling Investors Exactly What To Buy
summary: The White House's $9.7T investment wave is heavily concentrated in AI, chips, and energy—boosting Nvidia, Microsoft, Oracle, and GE Vernova.
